name: Sharon Kirkpatrick
text:
If I could give them zero stars I would.
They had our Excavator for almost a month. "Had to replace battery, to do further diagnostic test", then said "can't get a replacement hydrolic pump, can't find anyone to repair/ rebuild this pump". (I found one in less than 5 min.)  They failed to communicate unless I called them.
I don't know whether they were completely incompetent or thieves. Either way, find somewhere else to take your equipment.

name: Tj Bell
text: Been trying to buy a new tractor for almost three months. Had to apply multiple times for loan approval. Was never told that only one company offered free loader until I was denied by the other two. Now my credit score has taken a big hit and still no tractor. This happens after I spent the last 4yrs getting my credit score to 700+. And had just paid off $100k in loans and mortgage. Could have gotten a kubota the next week but thought that I’d give these guys a shot. My mistake

resp.text: Mr. Bell, I want to start off by apologizing for the negative experience with our company. We strive to provide the best customer experience possible. We recognize errors were made on our part and will work to get these corrected for the future. It is reviews such as yours that provide our company the ability to learn from our mistakes and make improvements to our processes.

name: Celia Beck
text: These guys are great!  They provided expert advice to a first-time buyer.  They found us the exact tracked loader we needed, with attachments.  Free delivery and even gave us lessons.  We will be buying from them again soon.  Roger was our saleman and he was fantastic

name: Cody Ballard
text: Just hit 200 hours on my mt-85 and this has been an awesome machine. So glad I was able to get in with bobcat of Huntsville. Awesome service guys can’t wait for the next purchase.

name: Tree Man Lee Cosbie
text: Every since David left this place has fell apart. I recommend you buy a different machine if you are considering a Bobcat in this area. Find a company that will take care of you after your purchase.

name: Jason Creasy
text: My company has purchased several brand new and used skid steers from Bobcat of Huntsville. We have had terrible service with them since one of the sales guy left. No one has helped get anything resolved. They have had a piece of our equipment for 3 months now to fix and havent even touched it. We have also had several parts sent to us that were wrong and have to ship back. Overall not happy with their service at all. David held this place together.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We are pleased to announce that Bobcat of Huntsville has recently been purchased by Berry Companies, Inc. (www.berrycompaniesinc.com) and we are dedicated to making the investments in Huntsville that will bring it up to a level that is equal to our other Bobcat dealerships across the country. It will take some time but you will be seeing changes that will allow us to provide the level of support that a Bobcat customer deserves. We will be in contact with you shortly.

name: Keith Jackson
text:
Nice people and a nice outdoor are. We didn't rent anything this time, but all the equipment seemed to be in good working order and clean.

They do demo days sometimes, so check the website or call for an opportunity to play with some cool machines for free. Would go again.

Great Service !

name: Kevin Clairmont
text: I don’t even know where to begin. I was on the road with my gas powered 2019 Ford Transit. On my way to delivery, my brakes started to growl badly. I called around and of course, most places need a day or two to get my truck brakes looked at and since I am an expeditor and live in my truck, I didn’t have the luxury of waiting. Thompson readily made themselves available to at least look at the problem and see if it’s something they can fix. The shop was swamped with work but Tim got Ben to begin working on it. All 4 brakes got new pads and rotors and in one case, a new caliper because of the neglect of a past brake job from another shop. A day and a half later, my truck was ready and so was I! I was pleasantly surprised when I saw the bill! Thompson set the bar high when it comes to fair pricing. I was shocked and eagerly paid my bill because I was expecting to pay so much more!! If I am in the area and need work done, Thompson is where I would go! Thank y’all at Thompson for your work and hospitality! If you’re looking for a competent mechanics with a hometown feel...you can’t go wrong with Thompson Tractor...I tip my cap and thank you for everything!!

resp.text: Kevin, we are so glad that you had a wonderful experience with our Truck department. Tim and Ben will be receiving a SPIRIT Coin, this is a coin we give to employees for going above and beyond for a customer.  If you are traveling through Alabama or the panhandle of Florida please stop again for any parts or service needs!

name: David Carlson
text: Had two fuel lines made ... Excellent place for part's... Great people working here...

resp.text: Thanks David, let us know if we can help in anyway in the future!

name: Glitt3r_goddess
text: Rented a tracked trencher for a day. Took about 3 hours to complete 800 feet, mostly bc it was a soupy mess here. Rental process was seamless. Staff were AMAZING....like SO HELPFUL and FRIENDLY. Didn't treat me like an idiot bc I can't back a utility trailer, (even though I have a cdl lol) guys just came out and did everything for me. When I need another piece of equipment, there's no where else I will go. Can't say enough for these guys. Cost about$235 or so for a full day, should have just rented it for 1/2 but I'm inexperienced 😂 fair prices. Excellent running equipment, the only thing that took a few minutes to do was a full inspection on the equipment that I used because it had just come back from another customer. I really appreciated that. No complaints here, I don't mind waiting a few minutes to make sure I get good running equipment!

resp.text: We are so glad to hear you had a great experience! No matter the skill level or experience we want to be here for all your equipment needs, even though it sounds like you know exactly what you are doing. Make sure to let us know if you have any rental needs in the future!

name: Jon Atchley
text: Great people that will help you with all your equipment needs!

resp.text: Jon, thanks for the great review! We are so glad we could help with your equipment needs and let us know if we can ever help in the future!

name: Gary Tyler
text: Rented a dump trailer and got it home realized the battery was dead. Plugged it in overnight and next day went to dump dirt and would only lift up about a foot before the battery was dead again. Ended up having to park truck with jumper cables next to it everytime to use trailer. Slowing down the project considerably. Told staff and the knocked off $10 wow. Needless to say first and last rental with these guys.

resp.text: Hello Gary. We’re sorry to read about your unfortunate experience. At Herc Rentals, one of our primary objectives is achieving customer satisfaction – from the equipment you rent, to the service you receive from our team members. Please call our customer solutions team, 800-654-6659, at your convenience and we’ll work toward a satisfactory solution. Thank you.

name: Eric Price
text: Rented a propane arc welder from this company to use on a job site in Montgomery, Alabama. They laid out the gound clamp and welding electrode holder that was suppose to go with the welding machine. When arrived at the job location the electrode holder was missing so had to purchase one with hookups. Also ran out of propane so tried to take the tank to have refilled but the propane tank was no able to be filled because the inspection date was past due and from 1999 so had to pay to have the propane tank exchanged to be able to continue work. The company would not return phone calls and when you get someone on the phone they say we will have someone call you back and they never do. Will not use this company again.

name: XXXKOUNTRY FAM
text: Great place. Some works are really friendly!! Others well!!!! Rent a lot here..johnny J. Tree Services

text: Poor customer service, they act like they are doing you a favor. Also, the safety guys, office workers, management walking around are totally ridiculous and on a power trip. NEVER rent here again. Get off your high horse and realize WE the CUSTOMERS are what gives you a payday.

name: ken hollis
text:
I had a very good experience at Valley Repair Service on 7-2-2019. We had a lawn tractor wheel and hinge break off a cutting deck. I called this service and spoke with Ken the shop foreman and he told me they could make the repair. I drove to the shop with trailer and mower in tow. Ken welded the wheel hinge back onto the cutting deck within minutes! Great service and very nice welding work!
Thank you to Ken and Valley Repair Service!

text: The real deal price was good fixed and gone by next day looked on web of parts prices almost same great people oil cooler and pre cooler replaced could have bin same day gone but had to wait for pre cooler to be shipped in there is a post on here says that they were sitting around if so was because there fast and great at what they do no bs like other places I have bin labor was spot on no wasted time I’ll go there any time hard to find honest people any more and took me to hotel and return for free again bill was less than expected office ladies were very nice too😊 keep up the good work god be with you and yours !! 👍

name: Terrance Maxwell
text: I made the call on Tuesday and, Ray told me to bring it in first thing Wednesday morning.I really didn't know what was going onwith the truck other than the leak that was coming from the chunk on front axle on the drives.i found out after they ran a diagnosis on it they said that the engine was running to cool so they did an overhead on it and it had a bad injector and thermostat on.I was out of the shop around 3pm Thursday.

resp.text: Hey Terrance, we are so glad you had a great experience and we could help you get back on the road. Please let us know if we can ever help in the future!

name: Barbara Champion
text: Fast on service call. Friendly, well mannered polite employees. Big & busy truck repair shop. All of their service call trucks were busy out on calls so they sent someone from their shop to help get us back on the road since we broke down on the exit to their shop (EX-68)Just 3 miles off of I-20 Very satisfied with their work🙂

name: Aaron Bell
text: It was crowded with equipment that needed to have work done to them, also I saw a group of mechanicas sitting around when they should've been working especially when the company is charging a$100and more an hour.

name: Amelia Hiott
text: i work with my husband and we had to go in that shop for repairs..all i can say is DON'T take ur deisel there if u value ur truck!! i have never wrote a review b4..never!! but i had to tell people about our experience there..both times there they let kids work on our deisel..they do not know what they are doing!! plus a 2 r 3 hour job takes all day for them so they can justify a huge bill. the work we got done we ended up havn to go to another shop to repair what work they did..i have been on the truck with my hubby for 5 yrs now and we have had major to minor work done all over the u.s. but this place beat all i have ever seen..those workers goofed off and took more breaks than actually working..and they were all young!!! my husband had to tell that kid workn on our truck what to do bcause he didnt know what he was doing..Lord help that place!!

resp.text: Glad to hear it, thanks Lee. We appreciate it!

name: Dale Byrd
text: I have been dealing with United for over two years now and have had great customer service from Hunter Ellenburg out of the branch on Laughlin Rd in Mobile AL. He has always gone above and beyond to make sure our needs are taken care of.

name: david lyndall
text: Rent somewhere else!  They bragged about their equipment being better that others and theirs still  messed up. Man lift Would periodically stop working in rotation. Caused a huge delay in the job.  Returned  back, explained the problem  and they did a 1 minute test... How thorough can you be in thaybtime frame.  They said it's working fine. Didnt put a man in the basket, didn't raise it up and check much at all. A joke.  Waste of 380. Going to Sunbelt to get a decent piece of equipment. But hey at least they said thank you.

name: Quality Marine
text: Great Company and Service!!! Thank You!!!!

name: Matt Farmer
text: Get people to work with. Always egear to help you with your needs.

name: Shawn Albert
text: Had a great customer service experience here. Staff went out of their way to help out. To top it off, I got a good price on a new tractor.

resp.text: Shawn, we had such an incredible time working with you to get a new tractor. It means the world to us to see this amazing review! Looking forward to seeing you again soon. -Mike M., General Manager

name: Tammie Cooley
text: Great selection of tractors, lawn mowers, stihl products, Kubota products, walker mowers - they have great sales team and financing with zero down if  needed! Always willing to help find the perfect equipment you need

name: David A
text: Helpful staff as always, but it was hard to Maintain 6'  and look for a leaf blower. Only got a two  of 5 stars because no employees were wearing a mask. Bought my Leaf blower at Ace Hardware because all their employees were wearing masks. We all have a choice on where and how to shop, I just did not get a comfortable feeling there during this pandemic. Respectfully, David ( I love my new Stihl leaf blower )

resp.text: David, we're upset to hear you didn't stick around to grab a leaf blower from us. We understand your concern with the current pandemic, and our crew is doing everything they can to adjust to state mandates and guidelines. However, this shouldn't stop us from showing you our well-known standards of great service. We hope you can return soon to chat with us about anything else you need. We'd love for a second chance. Thanks! -Mike M., General Manager

name: Tyler Atkisson
text: Knowledgeable staff, quick repairs and loads of inventory

resp.text: Tyler, thank you for your kind thoughts and your review rating. Sometimes we  fall short in some ways, but we keep trying to improve as a dealership. Mike McGlothlin, General Manager.

name: Tom Parker
text: Great people. Service Dept is excellent. Highly recommend as a go to dealer for Kubota equipment and service.

resp.text: Tom, happy you could stop by! Looking forward to the next time you make it our way. Mike M., General Manager

name: Kenneth Kendrick
text: not very friendly service.

resp.text: Kenneth, it's truly upsetting to hear about your recent visit as we always work hard to make sure you feel welcome here. If you would care to explain which department and time and circumstances of your visit it may help in our team's development moving forward . We'd love to work with you again to make things right. -Mike M., General Manager

name: Stephen Newell
text: Service department was outstanding and very respectful.  Waiting to see how the repairs go and what the bill is going to be. They were going to get to work within a couple days.

name: blessed7fold
text: Beware: These guys will jerk you around on price.

resp.text: Sorry that you feel that way. If you would like, you can contact me(Steve) and we can work to resolve the issue.

name: jimmy smith
text: Frendly, very helpful people at the counter.

name: wayne bigbee
text: RUDE!!! I CALLED WITH QUESTION AND FELT SORT OF LIKE I WAS TAKING SOMEONES TIME THAT HAD BETTER ZHINGS TO DO.

resp.text: Sorry you feel that way but if its a service Question feel free to call and ask for Billy. I would be glad to help you sir.

name: emmanuelwillis
text: I purchased a loader from Talladega Tractor a couple months back and what can I say other than these guys are great! My salesman (John Parks) was very friendly and helpful with the loader purchasing process. The staff were very friendly as well and knowledgeable about the product. I will most certainly be driving two hours past my local Kubota dealer to Talladega Tractor for my next big Kubota purchase!

resp.text: Thank you for your business!!

name: Beverly Hughes
text: Nice people!

resp.text: We're grateful for you taking a moment to show your support, Beverly! We'd love to welcome you back our way again soon. -Mike M., General Manager

name: redhot recycling
text: Great experience on a used Kubota. Were also very fair on a trade. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!!

name: Buddy Parker
text: The Service Department provided the requested services in a fair, friendly and prompt manner.

resp.text: Thank you for using Talladega Tractor

name: Marcus Tillman
text: Good people.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving this review, Marcus! Hoping we'll see you again. -Mike M., General Manager

name: Stacy Brand
text: Great guys to buy from if you need a tractor, lawn mower, or chainsaw.

name: Brian Mosley
text: Great place, amazing customer service. This crew goes above and beyond the call of duty. My Uncle and I made our first visit last year just to look around and browse the inventory, not sure if he was going to buy anything or not, really to just have something to do. From that very moment on it's like visiting family...... The good kind. Lol. Shelley, Mike, Steve, and everyone else, I thank you for your time and kindness. No matter how busy they are, they will make sure you're happy and all questions are answered.

name: Ronnie Denney
text: Great people.  Friendly,  very helpful.

name: Brian Mosley
text: Great place, amazing customer service. This crew goes above and beyond the call of duty. My Uncle and I made our first visit last year just to look around and browse the inventory, not sure if he was going to buy anything or not, really to just have something to do. From that very moment on it's like visiting family...... The good kind. Lol. Shelley, Mike, Steve, and everyone else, I thank you for your time and kindness. No matter how busy they are, they will make sure you're happy and all questions are answered.

name: Bobby Tidwell
text: Not friendly act like they don't care help with your needs

name: Jerry Walton
text: good trip.

name: Derrick Huey
text: Good selection on Kubota tractors

name: Michael Willis
text: They ordered the part I needed as well as loaded me a brand new tiller for my tractor.   If you are in the need for a tractor, I'd suggest you go see the guys down at Talladega tractor.

name: John Spears
text: Can't comment on the sales crew but the service dept is outstanding! They are very knowledgeable and helpful!

name: Tommy Ivey
text: Took cub cadet in to have plastic fan on right transmission repaired. Decided to get tune up since it would be there. Was told a week for repair and tune up. 15 days later got it back. Service manager said all work was on sale at 10% off. Tune up was $160 .  Replaced 2 spark plugs,oil,fuel  and air filter plus oil. Rediculous charge. Fan was $30 and labor for complete job wad $260.80. Once again rediculous. Car dealers are not this exspensive. On top of that first time i cut grass the left mower spindle is bad. Had no issues with it before. Big time rip off. Never go there again. Kept it 15 days for 3.26 hrs of work. No im sorry or anything. Done with them. They charge $80 an hr. to work on a lawn mower.

name: Chris East
text:
Don't think because your a loyal customer they will treat you better I learned the hard way last Thursday 3-29-18 I've bought a exmark quest zero turn mower , stihl 391 chain saw and a stihl fs 91 weed eater I was looking to buy a new exmark zero turn mower the raduis was what I was looking at first off they wouldn't budge on the price then lied and said exmark only offered 42 month financing well I know for a fact that's a lie cause I went to another place and bought one and got 48 months financing they get a bigger kick back off of 42 months sure I know I've not spent a $100,000 on a tractor but when I needed something I never hesitated to go to them and buy that will not happen again
B&R tractor in Linville gave me a great deal on a mower and they are not the only people who sell stihl products they don't care about the person just how much money they can squeeze out of you shop around before you buy

name: Darryl Pairodocs
text: I purchased Kubota and Case tractors from them over the last couple of years and I am very happy with the products and services offered by them. I consider myself hard to please.

name: Chastity Bonner
text: Was awesome !!!!   Friendly staff, and very knowledgable of product !!!!

name: Larry Smith
text: Really nice folks to deal with.

name: Chris Mauldin
text: Great group of guys and gals.

name: Leigh Sims
text: Got different stuff to look at when you go there every time

name: Geoff Smith
text: Good service and parts in stock!

name: Pat Stephens
text: Terrible, people.sitting around talking and no one offered to help. Will take business to Oxford

name: Louis Carson
text: If you don’t buy there really do not want to help.

name: Randy Buck
text: Right parts. First time

name: Stephanie Fugatt
text: One word.....RUDE!!!

name: Jason Haney
text: Friendly staff. Walked with me and answered my questions about the Tractors and equipment on their lot.

name: Edward TURNER
text: Very good

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Jerry Johnson Johnson
text: Good equipment and service

name: Silas
text: Costly

name: beardenjim
text: Service department is getting to be quite rude to work with

name: Langdon Horn
text: Service here rocks.

name: John Taktlkos
text:
(Translated by Google) What can I say Sthil Sthil and Sthil

(Original)
What can I say Sthil Sthil and Sthil

name: Ronnie Ridlon
text: Wanted to share my experience with United rentals in Foley Alabama. Absolutely amazing, every single person I deal with is awesome and extremely helpful! But I have to give the biggest thanks & Recognition to Sara Polansky! She is amazing, gets whatever I need no matter the hurtles. Always comes though with perfect service!  Great company and people I highly recommend them for anything you can rent.

resp.text: Thanks for the shout-out, Ronnie. We appreciate the feedback and hope we can help out again soon.

name: Jimmy Chivers
text: I always receive the best service when I rent a piece of equipment. The people are very helpful and friendly.

name: John Jr Blacksher
text: When I pull in the yard, I never have to wait more than a minute to get waited on. Got to keep my head on a swivel because someone will be coming soon on a forklift to get the trailer off or to unload my truck.

resp.text: Thanks, John. Looking forward to working together again soon.

name: Kevin Maxwell
text: Sales associate(Angie) from the Pensacola Branch has been a pleasure to work with. She always takes care of me and all rentals set up for delivery and pick up with no issues.

resp.text: Thanks, Kevin. We appreciate the positive feedback and shout-out for our team. We're glad we were able to help you with your equipment needs and look forward to working together again soon.

name: Tim Simpson
text: Great place to rent equipment, very friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks, Tim. We appreciate the feedback and your business. Let us know if there's anything we can do to help in the future.

name: Jake Plash
text:
Nice staff, very knowledgeable. There is this one mechanic named Jon, he went out of his way to help my crew understand the machine we picked up. We asked every question possible and he never once brushed us off or got irritated with us(and it was hot out). You don’t get many people that are so knowledgeable and professional. We will come
back just for that one mechanic alone. Good job United

name: Jeff Devine
text: GREAT SERVICE

resp.text: Thanks, Jeff. We appreciate the positive feedback and shout-out for our team. Let us know if we can help out again soon.

name: Angela Wingard
text: Very professional staff. They are always ready to help. The whole team seems to work well together. I love hearing around town how reliable United’s machines are. Great company to help with all your jobs, big or small!
